TopicTitle: KSP Store Transfer to Steam Quirk

Articles.Content:
Short story is that I was able to transfer my KSP Store purchase to a Steam key. The quirk is that I bought KSP on December 12th, 2013, but the game released on Steam on March 20th, 2013 (you're not supposed to be able to transfer from Store to Steam if you bought it after it came out on Steam). I'm perplexed as to why the KSP Store allowed this. I'm downloading KSP through Steam to my desktop as I type this! Now I shall know how much MORE time I sink into this game!

Edited September 15, 2014 by turkwinif
That's rather curious. Not sure why that would happen... Heh. Good luck.

Kenbob, you can always request a steam transfer by emailing [email protected] I think. Be sure to include things like your order ID - and no, there's no guarantee they'll actually give you a Steam key, but you can try..
